attributes.action: use international power to cancel all unjust or illegitamate Thirld World debt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What is illegitimate debt?

Debt that a country can’t afford to repay without meeting its peoples basic needs
Debts on loans that the lender gave to oppressive regimes knowing that they were unlikely to benefit the people
Debts on loans that the lender knew were going to be stolen through corruption
Debts in payment for projects that failed because of bad advice
Debt on unfair terms, such as exorbitantly high interest rates and penalty terms


What is Needed?

It is important that safeguards are implemented to ensure that a similar debt crisis can’t reoccur in the future.

Full and immediate cancellation of unjust debts. Including debts that can only be repaid through neglecting the basic humanitarian needs of its people

An end to harmful conditions, which are imposed by institutions on the terms of repayment.

Future lending must be done in a transparent and open manner by lending countries

The rich world must fund cancellation through new money
